title: Standup bot (3/4): override config
description: This is the third bot for the Mattermost Standup Bot. This workflow will override or update the configuration file as needed. This workflow is called by the 'Standup Bot - Worker' workflow.
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
